languages.text: {n}Абеляр, кажется, вырастает на пару сантиметров вместе с облегченным вздохом.{/n} "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан!"
{n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр, кажется, вырастает на пару сантиметров вместе с облегченным вздохом.{/n} "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "Will do, Lord Captain!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德松了口气，似乎连个子都变高了些。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德松了口气，似乎连个子都变高了些。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard atmet erleichtert auf und scheint um mehrere Zentimeter zu wachsen.{/n} "Wird erledigt, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard atmet erleichtert auf und scheint um mehrere Zentimeter zu wachsen.{/n} "Jawohl, Lord Captain!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira aliviado y hasta parece crecerse unos centímetros.{/n} «¡A la orden, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira aliviado y hasta parece crecerse unos centímetros.{/n} «¡A la orden, Lord Capitán!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir de soulagement et se redresse.{/n} « Ce sera fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir de soulagement et se redresse.{/n} « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは安堵のため息をつき、身長が数センチ伸びたように見えた。{/n}「承知いたしました、ロード・キャプテン！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは安堵のため息をつき、身長が数センチ伸びたように見えた。{/n}「承知いたしました、ロード・キャプテン！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}İçi rahatlamışçasına nefes alan Abelard, kendinden emince konuşuyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard breathes a sigh of relief and seems to grow an inch or two taller.{/n} "It will be done, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard içi rahatlamışçasına nefes alıyor ve birkaç santim uzamış gibi gözüküyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
